alert.note: Alert for East Polk; North Clearwater; Red Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:27PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Red Lake, east central Polk and northwestern Clearwater Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 327 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oklee, or 29 miles southeast of Thief River Falls, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oklee, Gonvick, Gully, Trail, Berner, Olga and Weme. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Polk; North Clearwater; Red Lake
